story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_0100: What’s the matter? You’re not gonna battle?
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_0200:
If Genesect’s attack reaches us, we’ll take some
damage for sure.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_0500:
Hilbert! We’ll deal with Team Plasma! I’m counting
on you to fight the Shadow Triad!
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_0700:
I know... But their teamwork doesn’t leave
any openings.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_0800: We’ll run out of energy if we just randomly shoot.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_1100: If that’s the case, we can do it in one shot!
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_1200:
Whisper your plans to each other all you like.
It won’t get you anywhere.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_1400: I’m not so sure about that.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_1700: We did it! We made a hole in the wall!
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2300:
The Shadow Triad’s moves were sophisticated and
perfectly ordered.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2400: That is why it was easy to deduce their motives.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2500:
In this narrow passage, they kept getting in
our way.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2600:
And every time we tried to go a certain way,
they’d push us back, with solid defense.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2700:
Hence you could tell there was something
important in that direction!
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_2800:
And that’s how you concluded your friend would
be there!
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_3000: N and Hugh must be close by.
story_teamplasma_02_06000/2401_1001_3100: We should hurry and find them!
